abstracted_objective: Start a sequential code flow, with multiple subtasks performed in turn
Identify, isolate, and characterize the essential components, attributes, and relationships of the input to define its structure and function
Evaluate entities against defined criteria to confirm validity, consistency, and reliability, and identify causes of deviations or failures
Determine how a specified change affects elements or outcomes by measuring the resulting state and evaluating its significance
Evaluate a collection against criteria and select the elements that conform to or deviate from those criteria
End of current sequential code flow
